channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: #001: Barebones
item.description: First Post! I never formally created a project with most of the knowledge I’ve gained ths far, and I wanted to focus on every aspect of the project: how it’s built, how the application works, how it’s prepared, deployed, etc. I think these posts will be a great introduction into getting a some idea about the “fuzzy” stuff we see in web dev; making sense of the buzzwords and learning how things work.
